body.name: Steamer for Clothes, Kolohoso 1500W Fast Heat Up Handheld Garment Steamer, Portable Travel Clothing Fabric Steamer with Upgraded Nozzle and 260ml Water Tank
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 25 mins
Or fastest pickup Friday, February 16. Order within 22 hrs 10 mins
features: 【Removes Creases Efficiently, Safe on All Fabrics】- 1500 watts with 30-second fast heat-up, our handheld steamer can give out 25g/min high temperature spray, safe to use on all fabrics. This can help to faster and most effective in removing tough wrinkles on any fabric from cotton, wool, silk, fiber without harming your clothes.

【No-Splling at Any Angle, Perfect Gift】- The latest electronic pump system ensure it won't leaking or spilling. You can use it at any angle, whaterever you to steam clothes placed horizontally or hung vertically. The high-quality clothing steamer will satisfy your family and friends, will be a perfect gift for family and friends.

【Portable and Compact Size Travel Steamer】- This clothing steamer has durable 83inch/240cm cable, hand-held and compact size design, is lightweight, easy to move and use. Perfect for business trips, vacations, destination weddings, or any other place where you'll need to smooth and de-wrinkle delicate clothing quickly, safely, and gently!

【Stainless Steel Soleplate & Large Water Tank】 Upgraded smooth stainless steel panel, not easy to deform, strong and durable. The large detachable 260 ml water tank, support for about 18 minutes of continuous steaming, portable to use. The garment steamer can easily soften, refresh, and de-wrinkle a wide range of fabrics including clothing, delicates, bedding, curtains, upholstered furniture, and more.

【Safe Auto Stop Funtion & Package List】If the water tank is short of water, don't worry if you forget to turn off the power. This garment steamer has a auto-stop protection function, and it will automatically stop working after 50 seconds of water shortage. Package with a 1500W steamer with a 8-foot power cord, lint brush.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose our multi-functional advanced clothes steamer ？ Suit for any fabric, no chemicals are used, the fabric is smooth and refreshing, wrinkle-free and disinfection. The steamer is safe and easy to use, does not iron clothes, and is suitable for all fabrics, such as cotton, linen, silk, polyester, wool, velvet, curtains, bed sheets and other common blended fabrics. Say goodbye to stubborn folds! It can be used at any angle, allowing you to steam your clothes when placed horizontally or hung vertically.

Kolohoso garment steamer is a powerful hand-held fabric clothing steamer Newly upgraded rapid warm-up time-just plug it in and be ready in 30 seconds or less. Exclusive 1500 watt steam flow provides 25g/min hot steam and produces results quickly. The newly optimized 260ml water tank can provide sufficient steam and can provide up to 15 minutes of steaming time.

No-Spilling 30-second Preheat Kolohoso steamer heat-up in 30s,has upgrade no-spilling system, quickly release wrinkles vertically or horizontally as an iron without leaking. Large Water Tank The large detachable 260ml(10oz) water tank support give out a maximum spray volume of 25g/min about 15 minutes of continuous hot steaming. Lock Steam Switch Simple to lock the trigger for a continuous flow of steam.(Heat-up 30s till the indicator light turn green, unlock the trigger can release steam) Extra Steamer Accessories Lint Brush: helps remove lint. Don't use if you don't have to remove lint. Steamer with ultra-long 8ft cord provide maximum reach and convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and effective
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this steamer to replace a old Conair that lasted me for over 3 years.I needed an affordable replacement and I’m very happy that I decided on this model .This steamer has a large head and delivers a powerful stream output. It works the same horizontally and vertically.Literally Knocks the wrinkles out of the clothes quickly. It has a large water tank so it reduces filling up often. It heats up fast. No leaking and Works really well on curtains and the mattress.Fits easily in standard carry on luggage.Lightweight and easy to maneuver~All-around perfect for my needs and extremely happy with his purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well, heats up quickly
reviews.reviewText: It works great and is easy to use. it heats up quickly but I would not recommend traveling with it as it is large and heavy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this to steam block my hand knit garments. I’ve only used it once so far, but it worked well! The cord was long enough to reach easily, the steam lock button was VERY convenient, and there was more than enough water in the tank to finish the job. I’m knocking off one star because the water tank was a bit hard to get out (hoping this improves with use).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: This is a good generic steamer. It lets out a lot of steam, so it does get the fabric pretty wet. But I prefer that to a weak steamer. My friend (bride) and I (bridesmaid) brought our steamers for her dress, for the getting-ready time. Her steamer was one of those really bougie-looking rose gold steamers. Unfortunately, her cord was really short and it hardly made a difference in steaming her veil. I mean, it was barely letting out any steam at all. It would've taken hours to steam the veil and even then, I'm not sure how well that would've worked. I gave up on her steamer and started using mine. Wow, this steamer did the job and did it quickly. The cord was also double the length of hers. I wouldn't consider it extremely long, but those couple of feet made a huge difference! And any part of her dress or veil that got wet from the steamer dried up in minutes. It wasn't even a concern

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heats up fast, works great
reviews.reviewText: I use this for the things I keep in drawers and don’t have time to iron. Heats up fast and straightens out wrinkles in a reasonable amount of time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I became obsessed with a commercial sized steamer I accidentally acquired. When it broke a few years ago I definitely missed it. I’ve tried a few handheld steamers from Amazon with no luck but this one is amazing! Super easy, holds plenty of water and is perfect for traveling!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Picture Perftext Replica of Magic Prog BUT
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is picture picture as a replica for MagicPro but it doesn’t work the same. It leaks and doesn’t have the same power as MagicPro. Easy to handle, but due to minimal steam reason and leaks doesn’t steam garment as well as the MagicPro which is the search engine I used to purchase this unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly, love it! I had purchased a different one, same style, but the on button was digital. On button broke after first use. I returned it and bought this one because it had an actual on button, not a digital one. Best steamer!

reviews.reviewTitle: easy to use lightweight when water not in for carrying
reviews.reviewText: I love it. It looks nice, easy to use and works perfect and lightweight for travel
Works great! Super easy to use and heats up fast. Kind of bulky though. Not great for travel.
great little unit , heats up quickly .. could be a little bigger reservoir, but understood it would then be heavier. this unit is great for quick jobs or travel
Steams out wrinkles very well...easy to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: Worked great first time, stops working in middle and makes my clothes soggy
reviews.reviewText: Problem causing, has been malfunctioning in just a months use and of no use at all. make my clothes soggy when used and wrinkles are still there. Regretted buying it, that too at higher price than now.
